meanings.definition: Having little or no concern for oneself, especially with regard to fame, position, money, etc.
meanings.sent1: She always puts others first, showing a selfless attitude.
meanings.sent2: The selfless act of donating all her savings to charity touched many hearts.
meanings.sent3: It was selfless of him to give up his seat on the crowded bus for an elderly lady.
meanings.sent4: Her selfless dedication to helping those in need is truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The selfless firefighter risked his life to save the trapped kitten from the burning building.

meanings.definition: Showing unselfish concern for the welfare of others.
meanings.sent1: The selfless volunteer spent hours helping the homeless in the community.
meanings.sent2: Her selfless actions spoke louder than any words of gratitude.
meanings.sent3: The selfless act of sharing her lunch with a hungry classmate made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: His selfless love for his family knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The selfless nurse worked tirelessly to comfort her patients during their recovery.
